About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

My name is Trevor Lehmann

I started Web Developement in March of 2020 when the world went into a global lockdown. This threw my entire life into a neverending crisis for sometime. I was working in the retail sector for a well established printing company. I immediately felt the financial repercussions of being unable to work and to rely on the good nature of other people.


I saw this "free time" as an opportunity to re-evaluate my whole life. I asked the usual questions of:

Am I happy with my current situation? Can I change it? If so, what can I offer?

I signed up for several courses in Web Developement and have since not looked back. I have completed over 100 hours of studies already and completed 4 projects (none of which have yet been published). I am currently well versed in HTML & CSS and I am currently learning about further CSS frameworks like: Sass, scss, Node & Bootsrap, This website was inititally created as a template where I can monitor my own progress and add to it as my career begins to expand

Challenge One

Learn HTML, CSS & CSS frameworks

Challenge Two

Learn JavaScript and other open-source web application framework like Angular & React to name a couple

Challenge Three

Learn back end applications and languages like PHP & Python programming

Technical Skills

Adobe Photoshop

Adobe Illustrator

HTML & CSS
